! Title: Software Alternatives Blocklist for Google
! Expires: 1 day
! Description: Filters to block and remove automatically generated software comparison websites from search engines.
! Homepage: https://github.com/Adikso/software-alternatives-adblock
!
! GitHub issues: https://github.com/Adikso/software-alternatives-adblock/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://github.com/Adikso/software-alternatives-adblock/pulls

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="alternativeto.net"])
google.*##a[href*="alternativeto.net"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="g2.com"])
google.*##a[href*="g2.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="getapp.com"])
google.*##a[href*="getapp.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="alternativesp.com"])
google.*##a[href*="alternativesp.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="capterra.pl"])
google.*##a[href*="capterra.pl"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="ebool.com"])
google.*##a[href*="ebool.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="topbestalternatives.com"])
google.*##a[href*="topbestalternatives.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="top8alternatives.com"])
google.*##a[href*="top8alternatives.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="topalter.com"])
google.*##a[href*="topalter.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="softwareadvice.com"])
google.*##a[href*="softwareadvice.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="hackerspad.net"])
google.*##a[href*="hackerspad.net"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="softwaresuggest.com"])
google.*##a[href*="softwaresuggest.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="altapps.net"])
google.*##a[href*="altapps.net"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="saasworthy.com"])
google.*##a[href*="saasworthy.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="progsoft.net"])
google.*##a[href*="progsoft.net"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="softwareadvice.co.nz"])
google.*##a[href*="softwareadvice.co.nz"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="saashub.com"])
google.*##a[href*="saashub.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="alternatives.financesonline.com"])
google.*##a[href*="alternatives.financesonline.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="getapp.za.com"])
google.*##a[href*="getapp.za.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="similarweb.com"])
google.*##a[href*="similarweb.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="sitelike.org"])
google.*##a[href*="sitelike.org"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="xranks.com"])
google.*##a[href*="xranks.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="a2is.com"])
google.*##a[href*="a2is.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="knoji.com"])
google.*##a[href*="knoji.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="producthunt.com"])
google.*##a[href*="producthunt.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="stackshare.io"])
google.*##a[href*="stackshare.io"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="alternative.me"])
google.*##a[href*="alternative.me"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="opensourcealternative.to"])
google.*##a[href*="opensourcealternative.to"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="trustradius.com"])
google.*##a[href*="trustradius.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="justalternativeto.com"])
google.*##a[href*="justalternativeto.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="capterra.com"])
google.*##a[href*="capterra.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="zeemly.com"])
google.*##a[href*="zeemly.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="slant.co"])
google.*##a[href*="slant.co"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.appsious.com"])
google.*##a[href*="www.appsious.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href*="libhunt.com"])
google.*##a[href*="libhunt.com"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href^="https://sourceforge.net/"][href$="/alternatives"])
google.*##a[href^="https://sourceforge.net/"][href$="/alternatives"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href^="https://slashdot.org/"][href$="/alternatives"])
google.*##a[href^="https://slashdot.org/"][href$="/alternatives"]:upward(1)

google.*##.g:has(a[href^="https://www.gartner.com/"][href$="/alternatives"])
google.*##a[href^="https://www.gartner.com/"][href$="/alternatives"]:upward(1)
google.*##.g:has(a[href^="https://www.gartner.com/"][href*="/compare/"])
google.*##a[href^="https://www.gartner.com/"][href*="/compare/"]:upward(1)
